name: Platformer Tutorial Game
description:
I created a beginner's tutorial on game development.  Come to my youtube videos for step-by-step videos on how to create the game.  It's a pretty simple platformer.  You'll learn how to create it from start to finish and even learn how to export it to Android or iOS (iPhone).  You'll also learn how to release it onto the Google PlayStore for Android.  Purpose to is show you the entire process and how much work it actually takes to even make a simple game and release it to production.

#Note: Game may lag on web browser / itch.io.  I couldn't really figure it out and read that other people ran into the same issues.  It doesn't lag on my computer, phone, or when it's released to the google play store.  Sorry for the lag on itch.io.
